text: Ezɨ kamaghɨn e bizir Ekiam amizibagh nɨghnɨgha, egha e fo, osɨmtɨzitam gumazir Godɨn arazibar gɨn zui tam batogham, God osɨmtɨzir kam uam ada a iniamin tuavim gɨfo. Ezɨ God arazir kurabagh amir gumazibagh fo, egha men arazir kuraba ikarvaghamin tuavim gɨfo, mamaghɨra ikɨ mangɨva Godɨn Kotɨn Ekiamɨn Dughiam otogham.
